entry.name: C++ Integration
entry.description: This example demonstrates how to integrate CUDA into an existing C++ application, i.e. the CUDA entry point on host side is only a function which is called from C++ code and only the file containing this function is compiled with nvcc. It also demonstrates that vector types can be used from cpp.
entry.supported-env: linux:x86_64, linux:i686, windows7, macosx:x86_64, macosx:i686, :arm, linux:ppc64le
